summary: This is an FBI financial request form from the Miami field office seeking approval for a $50 payment to AT&T for subscriber and billing information related to a target phone number in the investigation of Alfredo Rodriguez for obstruction of justice. The request is made pursuant to a federal grand jury subpoena.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Named as the subject of the obstruction of justice investigation for which the FBI is seeking phone records from AT&T.

events.title: FBI Request for AT&T Payment
events.description: The FBI Miami field office drafts a request for a $50 Third Party Draft to pay AT&T for subscriber, billing, and call detail records for a target phone number.

keyFacts: The FBI was investigating Alfredo Rodriguez for obstruction of justice under case number 72-MM-113327.
A federal grand jury subpoena (FGJ 10-503(WPB), No. 010-018) was issued to AT&T for subscriber and billing information related to a target phone number.
AT&T provided an invoice (GBS0729234) charging $50 for the requested records, which the FBI sought to pay via a Third Party Draft.
